Member Function Documentation

F3_MailformPlusPlus_Generator_TCPDF::generateFrontendPDF ( $  gp,
$  langFile,
$  exportFields = array(),
$  file = "",
$  returns = false 
)

Function to generate a PDF file from submitted form values. This function is called by F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation and F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail

Parameters:
array $gp The values to export
string $langFile The translation file configured in TypoScript of MailformPlusPlus
array $exportFields A list of fields to export. If not set all fields are exported
string $file A filename to save the PDF in. If not set, the PDF will be rendered directly to screen
boolean $returns If set, the PDF will be rendered into the given file, if not set, the PDF will be rendered into the file and afterwards directly to screen
See also:
F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Confirmation::process()

F3_MailformPlusPlus_Finisher_Mail::parseMailSettings()

Returns:
void|filename
